title: Mysterious World Beast God - Novel Updates

author: Buying Soy Sauce Tonight   今晚打酱油
description:
It was possibly history’s most pathetic passing through.

——Lin Wei transmigrated from modern times to another world, but his existing self had turned into a summon beast!

His life would usually be in a bizarre summon beast world, then suddenly summoned by his beautiful female master to go fight.

In order to restore his human body and pick up his beautiful female master, he upgrades himself with great effort!>
